articles.content: Gold and silver prices slid today in Indian markets amid weak global cues. On MCX, gold futures dipped 0.11% to 49,394 per 10 gram while silver dropped 0.71% to 66,821 per kg. In the previous session… [+2345 chars]

articles.title: Why NPS may not be the best retirement tool for all despite its advantages - Times Now
articles.description: Although NPS is a low-cost retirement savings plan it lags behind PPF and EPF on key benefits like taxability and post-retirement earnings.
articles.content: New Delhi: National Pension System (NPS) has some unique advantages as a retirement savings instrument. It is low-cost and also provides wide investment choices over other retirement savings products… [+2908 chars]
